Model structures¶

SVAT¶

Long-term hydrologic modelling of vertical processes.

  • Surface
    • Properties of upper interception storage
    • Properties of lower interception storage
    • Short description of land use (lu_id)
  • Soil
    • Soil hydraulic properties
  • Evapotranspiration
    • Evaporation from interception storage
    • Soil evaporation
    • Transpiration
  • Snow accumulation and snow melt
  • Interception
    • Interception from upper interception storage
    • Interception from lower interception storage
  • Infiltration
    • Matrix infiltration
    • Macropore infiltration
    • Shrinkage crack infiltration
  • Percolation / Capillary rise
    • Percolation
    • Capillary rise

SVAT-CROP¶

Long-term hydrologic modelling of vertical processes including crop phenology/crop rotation.

  • Crop phenology
  • Surface
    • Properties of upper interception storage
    • Properties of lower interception storage
    • Short description of land use (lu_id)
  • Soil
    • Soil hydraulic properties
  • Evapotranspiration
    • Evaporation from interception storage
    • Soil evaporation
    • Transpiration
  • Snow accumulation and snow melt
  • Interception
    • Interception from upper interception storage
    • Interception from lower interception storage
  • Infiltration
    • Matrix infiltration
    • Macropore infiltration
    • Shrinkage crack infiltration
  • Percolation / Capillary rise
    • Percolation
    • Capillary rise

ONED¶

Long-term hydrologic modelling of vertical and lateral processes.

  • Surface
    • Properties of upper interception storage
    • Properties of lower interception storage
    • Short description of land use (lu_id)
  • Soil
    • Soil hydraulic properties
  • Evapotranspiration
    • Evaporation from interception storage
    • Soil evaporation
    • Transpiration
  • Snow accumulation and snow melt
  • Interception
    • Interception from upper interception storage
    • Interception from lower interception storage
  • Infiltration
    • Matrix infiltration
    • Macropore infiltration
    • Shrinkage crack infiltration
  • Surface runoff
    • Hortonian surface runoff
    • Saturation surface runoff
  • Percolation / Capillary rise
    • Percolation
    • Capillary rise
  • Subsurface runoff
    • Lateral subsurface runoff via macropores
    • Lateral subsurface runoff via soil matrix

ONED-EVENT¶

Short-term hydrologic modelling of vertical and lateral processes.

  • Surface
    • Properties of upper interception storage
    • Properties of lower interception storage
    • Short description of land use (lu_id)
  • Soil
    • Soil hydraulic properties
  • Snow accumulation and snow melt
  • Interception
    • Interception from upper interception storage
    • Interception from lower interception storage
  • Infiltration
    • Matrix infiltration
    • Macropore infiltration
    • Shrinkage crack infiltration
  • Surface runoff
    • Hortonian surface runoff
    • Saturation surface runoff
  • Percolation / Capillary rise
    • Percolation
    • Capillary rise
  • Subsurface runoff
    • Lateral subsurface runoff via macropores
    • Lateral subsurface runoff via soil matrix
